title: Treatments for Prostate Cancer | UCLA Health Library, Los Angeles, CA
description: Detailed information on the most common treatment for prostate cancer
cleaned_text: Treatments for Prostate Cancer There are many different treatments for prostate cancer that involve the clinical care of a physician or other healthcare professional.
